content.question:
Directions: You will be asked to speak in Chinese on a specific topic. Imagine you are making an oral presentation to your Chinese class. First, you will hear and read the topic for your presentation. You have 4 minutes to prepare your presentation and 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible.

Choose ONE Chinese souvenir that you would like to purchase (for example, tea, toys, accessories, etc.). In your presentation, describe this souvenir and explain its significance.
